com.jalapeno.annotations
Annotation Type Lob

@Target(value={METHOD,FIELD})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Lob

Lets the Cache class generator know that the annotated property is to be mapped as a Lob type. There are two types of Lobs (streams), BLOB (binary Lob object), and CLOB (character Lob object). This annotation comes handy when types like byte[], Character[], String etc are to be mapped as Cache streams. Lobs are lazy loaded by default.

Optional Element Summary
 FetchType fetch
           
 LobType type
           
 

fetch

public abstract FetchType fetch
Default:
LAZY

type

public abstract LobType type
Default:
BLOB
